name: Goal Planner
description: Plan your weekly, quarterly, and yearly goals in Notion.Keep track of your goals and milestones from your phone, iPad, or computer.FAQsHow to download the template?Open the template link, then click "Duplicate" on the top right corner to duplicate it to your workspace.Does this work on the free version of Notion?Yes, all you need is a free account plan.Still have questions?Send your feedback or queries to heyeaslo@gmail.com
